sense.name: subtraction operator in mathematics
sense.commentary: MINUS[+entity][+symbolic][+notation][+arithmetic][+operator][+subtraction] Note: refers to the visible arithmetic sign "-", not the activity of subtraction (Sense 2)
sense.examples: There is a minus in front of that six-figure number. Sally got a minus on her A, because of grammatical mistakes.

sense.name: the act of subtracting one number from another
sense.commentary: MINUS[+action][+subtraction][+arithmetic] Note: refers to the act of subtracting, not the arithmetic symbol "-" (Sense 1)
sense.examples: Instead of doing three minuses, add those numbers together and just subtract their total. Your minus here is incorrect, the remainder is 65.44, not 64.23. (subtraction was wrong)

sense.name: a negative quality, a drawback
sense.examples: His foul language is definitely a minus in the boardroom. The small bedrooms and busy street are the minuses of this home. Thee are some minuses to running your own business.
